Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “Everything happens for a reason and the journey gives you all type of different experiences along the way,”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: reflecting on the highs and lows of his year after winning an Olympic gold medal

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “But this summer’s been amazing, just coming off a tough NBA year to experience what we did and get a win in the Olympics and some of the things I look forward to every year especially around our foundation and the work that we’re doing here in Oakland. ... Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Currys announced Thursday a commitment to raise and invest $25 million over the next five years devoted to literacy programs that will provide one-on-one tutoring for children who are at least two grade levels behind in reading.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: These students have been part of a pilot tutoring program through the Currys’ foundation that is again expanding its reach in Oakland Unified School District after efforts last year included the revitalization of six schoolyards.
